item.title: FAQ - How to start stop Apache on a Mac
item.description: So this is a very basic FAQ and notes on Apache for Mac Terminal Commands Starting: sudo apachectl start Stopping: sudo apachectl stop Restarting: sudo apachectl restart Make Apache start when you login to your Mac sudo launchctl load -w /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/org.apache.httpd.plist sudo launchctl unload -w /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/org.apache.httpd.plist
